entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then light snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
